metadata.title: CVE-2016-2546 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
sound/core/timer.c in the Linux kernel before 4.4.1 uses an incorrect typeof mutex, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (racecondition, use-after-free, and system crash) via a crafted ioctl call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2546` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-83-generic - 3.13.0-83.127
linux-image-3.13.0-83-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-83.127
linux-image-3.13.0-83-lowlatency - 3.13.0-83.127

linux-image-3.13.0-83-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-83.127
linux-image-3.13.0-83-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-83.127

linux-image-3.13.0-83-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-83.127
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-83-generic - 3.13.0-83.127
No subscription required
